Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
LayeredObject
SimulationObject
AnimateObject
Vehicle
public class Vehicle extends AnimateObject
This is a template for vehicles in the simulation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Color
    color
    Colour of the vehicle
    private int
    direction
    The orientation of the vehicle Values: 0 = North, 1 = East, 2 = South, 3 = West

    Indicates if oriented horizontally

    path
    Stores the path of the vehicle.
    private int
    posNum
    Indicates which element of path of index posNum the vehicle is heading towards
    private int[][]
    tempPath
    Path for this version of the script.
